question: Varun Bhati, who won bronze at the 2017 World Para Athletics Championships, is associated with which sports?
explanation: India bagged two medals in the high jump at the 2017 World Para Athletics Championships in London on July 22, 2017. In it, Varun Bhati bagged bronze medal in the T42 event by successfully jumping in the final at 1.77 metre. While Sharad Kumar won a silver medal by recording his career-best performance with a jump of 1.84 metre.  Earlier, Sundar Singh Gurjar from India clinched gold in the men\'s javelin throw event, Amit Saroha won silver medal in the club throw event in the F-51 category. And, Indiaâ€™s discus thrower Karamjyoti Dalal claimed a bronze medal in the Women\'s F55 category. With that, India have increased their medal tally to five in the Championships.
